tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysisData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_address VARCHAR(255),
    sentiment_score INT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(50),
    email_response TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysisData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sentiment_score INT,
    customer_name TEXT,
    email_address TEXT,
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EmailResponses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    email_address TEXT,
    response TEXT,
    response_time TIMESTAMP
);
